description: Get all metric values for a given label.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

end.description: The end of the time window in any format supported by https://github.com/araddon/dateparse.
end.title: end

endRelative.description: The relative end of the time window as time.Duration.
endRelative.title: endRelative

label.description: The label to retrieve all available values for.
label.title: label

limit.description: The max number of results to return.
limit.title: limit

query.description: A set of metric stream selectors that selects the streams to match and return label values for.
query.title: query

start.description: The start of the time window in any format supported by https://github.com/araddon/dateparse.
start.title: start

startRelative.description: The relative start of the time window as time.Duration.
startRelative.title: startRelative

title: MetricLabelValue
